hero.title: Engineering Manager & Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: Experienced Engineering Manager with over a decade of experience in IT, specializing in frontend development and team leadership. Based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

filmstruck.title: FilmStruck
filmstruck.description: Streaming service from Turner Classic Movies focused on rare, classic, foreign, arthouse, and independent cinema. Led a team that improved performance and implemented significant refactoring to enhance user experience.

pipedrive.title: Pipedrive
pipedrive.description: CRM platform designed to help salespeople manage complex sales processes. Contributed to UI libraries, feature launches, and platform improvements while focusing on technical excellence.

channel4.title: Channel 4
channel4.description: British public-service television broadcaster with an advanced digital streaming platform. Worked on improving user experience, streaming performance, and modernizing frontend architecture.

consultation.title: Hire Me
consultation.subtitle: Book a consultation session with me

option1.title: 1 Hour Consultation
option1.description: Comprehensive consultation to discuss your project, address specific challenges, or get expert advice on frontend development and team management.

option2.title: 30 Minute Consultation
option2.description: Quick session to answer your questions and provide guidance on specific technical issues or career development in frontend engineering.

option3.title: Custom Consultation
option3.description: Need something different? Let's discuss your specific requirements and create a tailored consultation package.

pipedrive.description: Started as Senior Frontend Developer and progressed to Engineering Manager, leading a team of up to 20 engineers. Fostered a positive culture focused on technical excellence.
achievements: Led a team of up to 20 engineers, turning around a failing team
Facilitated cross-team collaborations to achieve shared objectives
Delivered a significant feature overhaul, exceeding expectations
Contributed to UI libraries, feature launches, and platform improvements

accenture.description: Launched a video streaming service, improving performance by 5x and reducing technical debt by 89%. Implemented new workflows and prioritized ongoing learning.
achievements: Launched a video streaming service with 5x performance improvement
Reduced technical debt by 89% through strategic refactoring
Implemented new workflows to optimize team productivity
Prioritized continuous learning and professional development

footer.tagline: Engineering Manager & Frontend Developer with a decade of experience in building high-quality web applications and leading development teams.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Konstantin Vanichkin portfolio website. I respect your privacy and am committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how I collect, use, and protect your information when you use my website.

information.title: Information I Collect
information.content: I may collect, use, and store the following types of information when you visit my website:

items.usage: Usage data such as how you interact with my website, pages visited, time spent, and other diagnostic data.
items.contact: Contact information you provide when reaching out to me, including your name, email address, and the content of your message.
items.cookies: Cookies and similar tracking technologies that help enhance your experience.

usage.title: How I Use Your Information
usage.content: I use the information I collect for various purposes, including:

items.service: To provide and maintain my website.
items.communication: To respond to your inquiries and maintain communication.
items.improvement: To improve my website and services based on how visitors interact with it.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: I do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. I may share information with service providers who assist me in operating my website, but they are obligated to keep your information confidential.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: My website may use cookies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, but this may prevent some parts of the website from functioning properly.

security.title: Security
security.content: I value your trust and implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so I cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: I may update this privacy policy from time to time. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact me at:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Konstantin Vanichkin's portfolio website. By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.

services.title: Services Offered
services.content: Through this website, I offer various professional services, including but not limited to:

items.consulting: Technical consulting and advisory services related to frontend development and engineering management.
items.development: Custom software development and technical solutions.
items.mentoring: Professional mentoring and career guidance in the tech field.

payments.title: Payments and Fees
payments.content: All fees for consultation services are outlined on the website. Payment is required prior to the delivery of services unless otherwise agreed upon in writing. All payments are processed through secure third-party payment processors.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Konstantin Vanichkin and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from this website without prior written permission.

termination.title: Termination of Services
termination.content: I reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to my services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms of Service.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Konstantin Vanichkin be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the services.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Argentina, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: I reserve the right, at my sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to check these Terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of this website following the posting of any changes to these Terms constitutes acceptance of those changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact me at:
